bonvolu instali tornado version 3.1 aŭ p: please install tornado version 3.1 or higher
mjpg klienta rubo-kolektanto komenciĝis: mjpg customer garbage collector has started
agordas la nombron da kolumnoj uzataj po: configures the number of columns used to lay out the camera frames
kontrolas ĉu framfojoj povas esti redukt: controls whether frame sizes can be reduced to vertically fit the window or not
agordas la nombron da linioj uzataj por: configures the number of rows used to lay out the camera frames
reduktas framfrekvencon por ŝpari retan: dims the global frame rate to save network bandwidth and traffic (doesn't work on simple MJPEG cameras)
reduktas la efektivan rezolucion de ĉiuj: dims the actual resolution of all cameras to save network bandwidth and traffic (doesn't work on simple MJPEG cameras)
ĝeneralaj parametroj, komunaj al ĉiuj fo: general settings, not related to any camera
la uzantnomo uzata por agordi la sistemo: the username to be used for configuring the system
la uzantnomo por uzi por la monitorado: the username to be used for video surveillance
la pasvorto de la uzanto de monitorado (: the password for the surveillance user (leave empty for passwordless surveillance)
kontrolas novajn versiojn kaj plenumas ĝ: checks for new versions and performs updates
kreas dosieron kun la nuna agordo por ke: creates a file with the current configuration for you to save it locally
restarigas la agordon el antaŭe konservi: restores the configuration from a previously saved backup file
aktivigu ĉi tion, se vi volas uzi ĉi tiu: enable this if you want to use this camera device
alias pri ĉi tiu kamera aparato: an alias for this camera device
ebligas aŭtomatan brilon de programaro (: enables software automatic brightness (only recommended for cameras without autobrightness)
la video-rezolucio (pli grandaj valoroj: the video resolution (larger values produce better quality, but require more CPU power, larger storage space and bandwidth)
uzu ĉi tion por turni la kaptitan bildon: use this to rotate the captured image if your camera is not positioned correctly
agordas la nombron de kadroj kaptitaj de: Sets the number of frames captured by the camera every second (higher values produce smoother videos but require more CPU power, larger storage space and bandwidth)
ebligas maskeradon de bildoj por eviti r: enables image masking to prevent some image areas from being recorded to protect privacy
alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por ebligi/maleb: click this button to enable/disable the mask editor
vi povas aldoni iujn ajn pliajn opciojn: You can add any additional options here for the "motion" daemon (use the "name value" format, one option per line)
elektu kie kaj kiel viaj amaskomunikiloj: choose where and how your media is stored
indikas la stokan aparaton, kie la bildo: indicates the storage device where the image and video files will be saved
la adreso de la retservilo (IP-adreso aŭ: the address of the network server (IP address or hostname)
elektu la SMB-version, kiun vi povas uzi: selects the SMB version to be used (test the various options and see which one works best with your NAS)
la nomo de la interŝanĝa reto: the name of the network share
la uzantnomo kiu estu provizita kiam vi: the username to be supplied when accessing the network share (leave empty if no username is required)
la pasvorto bezonata de la reto dosieruj: the password required by the network share (leave empty if no password is required)
la radika vojo (sur la elektita stokada: the root path (on the selected storage device) where the files will be saved
alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por testi la ret: click this button to test the network share connectivity after you have filled in the required details
la uzata/tuta grandeco de la disko, kie: the used/total size of the disk where the root directory resides
aktivigu ĉi tiun opcion, se vi volas, ke: enable this if you want your media files to be uploaded to an external service
enable this if you want pictures to be uploaded to an external service
ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas, ke filmetoj: enable this if you want videos to be uploaded to an external service
elektu servon, al kiu la mediadosieroj e: choose a service to which the media files should be uploaded
la domajna nomo aŭ IP-adreso de la servi: the domain name or IP address of the server (eg ftp.example.com or 192.168.1.3)
la haveno por uzi konekti al la servo (l: the port to use when connecting to the service (leave it empty to use the default value)
la HTTP-metodo uzi por alŝuti dosierojn: the HTTP method to use when uploading files
La kompleta URL al la alŝuta servila fin: The complete URL to the upload server endpoint:
Por S3: ekz. http://my.minio:9000. Lasu: For S3: E.g. http://my.minio:9000. Leave it empty for AWS!
la loko (radika vojo) kie amaskomunikilo: the location (root path) where media files should be uploaded (e.g. /files/cam1/)
Aktivigu tion por elŝuti plurmediajn dos: enable this to upload the media files together with their subfolders, instead of placing them directly into the root location
ebligu ĉi tion forigi amaskomunikilaĵojn: enable this to delete the uploaded media files on cloud as well when the local media files get deleted according to file persistence setting, currently this option is available only for gdrive.
la uzantnomo por la alŝuta servo-konto: the username for the upload service account
la pasvorto por la alŝuta servo-konto: the password for the upload service account
la ŝlosilo uzata por aŭtentiĝi kun la al: the key used to authenticate with the upload service (normally required only during setup)
alklaku ĉi tie por akiri la ŝlosilan raj: click here to obtain the service authorization key
The AWS access key used to authenticate: The AWS Access Key Used To Authenticate with the Upload Service
la AWS-sekreta alira ŝlosilo uzata por a: the AWS secret access key used to authenticate with the upload service (usually required only during configuration)
la nomo S3-sitelo por la alŝuta servo (k: the S3 bucket name for the upload service (normally required only during setup)
alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por provi la alŝ: click this button to test the upload service after you have filled in the required details
ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas, ke URL estu: enable this if you want a URL to be requested after a media file is created
URL por transdoni kiam moviĝo estas dete: a URL to be requested when motion is detected; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number, %%f = file path
la HTTP-metodo por uzi kiam vi petas ret: the HTTP method to use when requesting the web hook URL (the given URL-encoded parameters will in fact be transmitted as indicated here)
ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas ekzekuti kom: enable this if you want to execute a command after a media file is created
Komando por esti plenumita post la kreo: a command to be executed after a media file is created; multiple commands can be separated by a semicolon; don't use semicolons inside commands; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number, %%f = file path
elektu kiajn informojn montras sur la ka: choose what information is displayed on the captured frames
Fiksas la tekston montritan sur la filmo: sets the text displayed on the movies and images, on the lower left corner
Difinas kutimon maldekstran tekston; la: sets a custom left text; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number, %%T = HH:MM:SS, \n = new line
Fiksas la tekston montritan sur la filmo: Sets the text displayed on the movies and pictures, in the lower right corner
Difinas kutimon dekstran tekston; la sek: sets a custom right text; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = number of event, %%T = HH: MM: SS, \n = new line
Difinas la grandecon de la superkovrita: sets the size of the overlay text
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas videofluon p: enable this if you want video streaming for this camera
Fiksas la nombron de kadroj transdonitaj: sets the number of frames transmitted every second on the live streaming.
Agordas la vivan fluan kvaliton (pli alt: sets the live streaming quality (higher values produce a better video quality but require more bandwidth).
Kiam ĉi tio estas enŝaltita, la bildoj e: when this is enabled, the images are resized before they are sent to the browser (disable when running on a slow CPU).
la rezolucio donita kiel procento de la: the streaming resolution given as percent of the video device resolution (higher values produce better video quality but require more bandwidth)
starigas la TCP-havenon, sur kiu aŭskult: sets the TCP port on which the webcam streaming server listens
la aŭtentiga metodo uzata de la rivereto: the authentication method used by the stream (choose Basic instead of Digest if you encounter issues with third party apps); surveillance credentials will be used
ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas pli malaltan: enable this if you want a lower frame rate for the live streaming when no motion is detected
URL kiu provizas JPEG-bildon kun la plej: a URL that provides a JPEG image with the most recent snapshot of the camera
URL kiu provizas MJPEG-fluon de la kamer: a URL that provides a MJPEG stream of the camera
URL kiu provizas minimuman HTML-dokument: a URL that provides a minimal HTML document containing the camera frame, ready to be embedded
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas kapti statik: enable this if you want to capture still images (pictures).
Difinas la nomon ŝablonon por bilddosier: sets the name pattern for the image (JPEG) files; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number, / = subfolder.
agordas la JPEG-bildkvaliton (pli altaj: sets the JPEG image quality (higher values produce a better image quality but require more storage space)
Moviĝa deĉenigo = bildo kaptita ĉiufoje: Motion Triggered = an image captured whenever motion is detected,
Intertempe = bildo kaptita ĉiun x sekund: Interval Snapshots = an image captured every x seconds,
Ĉiuj bildoj = konservas ĉiun kadron en b: All Frames = saves each frame to an image file,
Manual = manual snapshots using snapshot button.
agordas la intervalon (en sekundoj) por: sets the interval (in seconds) for the snapshots
Bildoj pli aĝaj ol la difinita daŭro est: images older than the specified duration are automatically deleted to free up storage space.
Difinas la nombron da tagoj post kiuj la: sets the number of days after which the pictures will be deleted automatically.
Kiam ĉi tio estas enŝaltita, butono sur: when this is enabled, a button on the camera frame will allow you to manually take snapshots.
ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas registri fil: enable this if you want to record movies
Difinas la nomon ŝablonon por por la fil: sets the name pattern for the movie files; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number, / = subfolder.
Kreu filmojn rekte de la kamerao. Ĉi tiu: Create movie files of the motion directly from the camera. This option should reduce CPU usage but does increase memory requirements. No image processing is performed so text overlays, privacy masks etc will not be on the resulting video.
Agordas la filmdosieron; ne ĉiuj formato: sets the movie file format; not all formats are guaranteed to work on all systems; if in doubt, test each format and select the one that works best with your video player.
Agordas la MPEG-video-kvaliton (pli alta: sets the MPEG video quality (higher values produce a better video quality but require more storage space).
Agordas la registradreĝimon: Moviĝa deĉe: sets the recording mode: Motion Triggered = a new movie created whenever motion is detected, Continuous Recording = one big movie file.
Agordas la maksimuman longon de filmoj e: sets the maximum length of movies, in seconds; if the motion event lasts longer, a new movie file is created; use 0 for unlimited length.
Filmoj pli aĝaj ol la difinita daŭro est: movies older than the specified duration are automatically deleted to free up storage space.
Agordas la nombron da tagoj post kiuj la: sets the number of days after which the movies will be deleted automatically.
Aktivigu ĉi tion, por uzi kaj agordi la: enable this to use and configure the motion detection mechanism.
Indikas la minimuman procenton de la bil: indicates the minimal percent of the image that must change between two successive frames in order for motion to be detected (smaller values give a more sensitive detection, but are prone to false positives).
Starigas la nombron da rastrumeroj ŝanĝi: sets the number of pixels changed between frames above which motion is no longer triggered (0 disables the limit).
enable this to automatically adjust the threshold.
Ebligu tion por aŭtomate ĝustigi la nive: enable this to automatically adjust the noise level.
Permane agordas la bruan nivelon al fiks: manually sets the noise level to a fixed value.
Difinas la procenton de la bildo, kiu be: sets the percentage of the image that needs to change so that the event is treated as a sudden light change instead of motion (0%% disables the function).
Ebligu tion apliki makulan filtrilon al: enable this to apply a despeckle filter to frames before detecting motion.
Agordas la nombron da sekundoj da silent: sets the number of seconds of silence (i.e. no motion) that mark the end of a motion event.
Starigas la nombron de kadroj kaptitaj (: sets the number of frames to be captured (and included in the movie) before a motion event is detected.
Starigas la nombron de kadroj kaptotaj (: sets the number of frames to be captured (and included in the movie) after the end of a motion event.
Fiksas la minimuman nombron da pluaj mov: sets the minimum number of successive motion frames required to start a motion event.
Ebligas bildigan maskeradon por pli sele: enables image masking for a more selective and precise motion detection.
La Inteligenta opcio aŭtomate detektas r: the smart option automatically detects regions with regular motion and dynamically builds an internal mask, while the editable mask allows you to manually build it yourself.
Pli altaj valoroj donas pli daŭran masko: higher values result in a longer-lasting smart mask with a slower building process.
Alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por ebligi/maleb: click this button to clear the current mask.
Alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por malplenigi l: click this button to clear the current mask.
Se ĉi tio estas aktiva, la bilda ŝanĝojn: if this is enabled, frame changes (number of pixels as well as the changed area) are shown on the video; temporarily enable this option to help adjust the motion detection parameters.
Kiam ebligite, kreas specialajn filmojn: when enabled, creates special movies and pictures that help debugging motion detection problems.
Ebligu tion se vi volas esti sciigita ki: enable this if you want to be notified when motion is detected.
Aktivigu ĉi tiun opcion, se vi volas ric: enable this if you want to receive an email whenever a motion event is detected.
Retpoŝtadresoj (apartigitaj per komo) al: email addresses (separated by comma) that are added here will receive notifications whenever a motion event is detected.
Enigu la hostname aŭ IP-adreson de via S: enter the hostname or IP address of your SMTP server (for Gmail use smtp.gmail.com).
Eniru la havenon uzatan de via SMTP-serv: enter the port used by your SMTP server (usually 465 for non-TLS connections and 587 for TLS connections).
Enigu vian SMTPan konton (kutime via ret: enter your SMTP account (normally your email address).
Enigu vian SMTPan pasvorton (por Gmail u: enter your SMTP account password (for Gmail use your Google password or an app-specific generated password).
Agordi kutimon De adreso, se via SMTP-se: set a custom From address, if your SMTP service requires one (the first destination email address will be used if left blank).
Ebligu tion, se via SMTP-servilo postula: enable this if your SMTP server requires TLS (Gmail needs this to be enabled).
Difinas la tempo-serĉan intervalon por u: defines the picture search time interval to use when creating email attachments (higher values generate emails with more pictures at the cost of an increased notification delay); set to 0 to disable picture attachments; you must also enable Still Images for this to work.
Alklaku ĉi tiun butonon por testi retpoŝ: click this button to test email notifications after you have filled in the required details.
ebligu tion se vi volas ricevi telegrama: enable this if you want to receive a telegram message whenever a moving event is detected
Kreante la telegram-bot-babilejon, vi ri: By creating the Telegram-Bot chat, you will get an API token that you need to enter here. Click the API button below for a step-by-step guide on how to get your API token. Also be sure to chat with your newly created "bot" after your key is generated, to make sure you get messages.
Kreu novan babilejon al id_chatbot (@id_: Create a new chat to id_chatbot (@id_chatbot) and choose to start. The chat will return the required number for this field.
difinas la bildan serĉtempan intervalon: defines the image search time interval to create telegram attachments (higher values generate more images at the cost of increased notification delay); set to 0 to disable image attachments; you must also enable Still Images for this to work; you will want to play with this number until an image is sent. A good starting number is 30 if you set still images to one motion triggered. For a standard move triggered, set this much lower.
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas, ke URL estu: enable this if you want a URL to be requested whenever a motion event is detected.
URL por esti petita kiam moviĝo estas de: a URL to be requested when motion is detected; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number
La HTTP-metodo por uzi kiam vi petas URL: the HTTP method to use when requesting the web hook URL (the given URL-encoded parameters will in fact be transmitted as indicated here).
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas lanĉi komand: enable this if you want to execute a command whenever a motion event is detected.
Komando por esti lanĉa kiam moviĝo estas: a command to be executed when motion is detected; multiple commands can be separated by a semicolon; don't use semicolons inside commands; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = day, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number, %%v = event number
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas lanĉi komand: enable this if you want to execute a command whenever a motion event ends.
Komando por esti lanĉa kiam moviĝokazaĵo: a command to be executed when motion event ends; multiple commands can be separated by a semicolon; don't use semicolons inside commands; the following special tokens are accepted: %%Y = year, %%m = month, %%d = date, %%H = hour, %%M = minute, %%S = second, %%q = frame number.
Ebligu ĉi tion, se vi volas difini ĉiuse: enable this if you want to define a weekly working schedule for motion detection.
Fiksas la labortagan tempintervalon por: sets the working schedule time interval for Mondays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Tuesdays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Wednesdays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Thursdays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Fridays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Saturdays.
sets the working schedule time interval for Sundays.
Difinas, ĉu moviĝodetekto devas esti akt: sets whether motion detection should be active during or outside the working schedule.
